submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        a = []
        b = 0
        c = 1
        abc = 0
    
        while c < len(colors) + k and b < len(colors):
            temp = c
            temp_end = temp % len(colors)
            while colors[temp_end] != colors[temp_end - 1] and (temp < (len(colors) + k - 1)):
                temp += 1
                temp_end = temp % len(colors)

            abc += max(temp - b - k + 1, 0)
            b = temp
            c = b + 1
        return abc
